userInterface
Class RecoverMessage

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      userInterface.RecoverMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class RecoverMessage
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Author:
John Bannister

Creates the window to recover a message from an image file and save the message. Creates an object of type ImageWithMessageEnc or ImageWithMessageUnEnc, depending on whether encryption is set, and manipulates them to save the text file.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Returns:

itemStateChanged

public void itemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent e)
Check if the check box has been changed. Updates textDecrypt.

Specified by:

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
Check which button is pushed and calls appropriate routines.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
See Also:
ActionListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent)

saveText

private void saveText()
Save the recovered text to a file. Uses openSave.saveTextFile() and openSave.save() static methods. Used by the save button.

createText

private void createText()
Create an image and tell it to extract the text, optionally decrypting. Will create one of: ImageWithMessageEnc or ImageWithMessageUnEnc depending on whether encryption is set. Used by the go button. Polls textDecrypt. Enables saveButton. Disables goButton and decryptText check box.

pickImage

private void pickImage()
Sets theImageFile to a file on the file system. Uses openSave.open() static method. Used by theImageButton. Updates theImagePath text value. May enable goButton.

reset

private void reset()
Resets objects to initial state.

fullReset

public void fullReset()
Calls reset() and also resets all controls to initial state. Used by cancel button and also by main window.
